author: SchmilK

changelog.release_notes:
Reduced font size to please OS 4.0
More attempts at weather stability

Now using new Location settings from MasterKey to fall back to when your current location is not found!

Please update your profiles at pmkey.xyz to include your preferred Latitude and Longitude!
Made some new changes for the way location is stored and recalled if no location could be acquired to keep the weather gods happy.

Update to weather code - should make getting weather the first time better.
Update to Pebble Time code - hopefully eliminate crashes for those who say it is crashing.
Better handling steps over step goal.
Adjusted for drawing past step goal

description:
This is the PREMIUM version of Schmurbery Digital 4.

50% off sale through Cyber Monday!!

Due to overwhelming number of feature requests I've decided to make a premium version to fulfill user requests.

The premium version includes 
-weather data from selectable sources
-weather API key using master key pmkey.xyz
-weather location fallback using master key pmkey.xyz
-preconfigured color combinations
-redesigned graphics for better display on PT and PTR
-configurable step progress goal
-step progress bar that fills to goal, then overwrites with a larger bar when you surpass your goal
-more features coming soon (analog version, weather icons, and more)

Standard features that are included
-19 different bluetooth logos to fancy up your face
-Enable/Disable vibrate on connection loss
Customizable colors for
-Background Color
-Date
-Battery shadow
-Battery
-Bluetooth logo
-Bluetooth connected
-Bluetooth disconnected
-Time
-Time Shadow
-Step counter
-Body color

Switch fonts between my custom font and a blocky font

Please enjoy, more to come!

Purchasing the premium version is optional, you can use this for 48 hours, or use the standard Schmurbery Digital 04.  This version comes with a 48 hour trial.  Paying the low cost of $1 to support this will help encourage further development of this and future watch faces designs!

Thanks for all the support so far!
title: Schmurbery Digital 04 Premium
